segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's pouring out, and the woman's just standing there oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle; she could slip and fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, stretching so far up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll come crashing down with the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too, but she's on the floor at least.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's damaging the cabinets; this could ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and stops this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart's racing just watching; someone needs to intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are getting soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR
